title: Procurement negotiations between a buyer and supplier

ai_one_conversation_history.content: You are a supplier and must negotiate the wholesale price of 10kg bag of wood pellets. This item is produced by your company at different quality levels. The Buying and Supplying company need to reach a deal in terms of Wholesale Price & Quality. A higher quality level agreed upon during the negotiation has consequences: For suppliers: higher quality is more costly to produce (PC). For the rest of the experiment, you will play the role of a supplier. In this simulation base retail selling Your Base Production Cost is 2. Try to get the wholesale price as high as possible. Wholesale price can range from 1 to 13, while quality from 1 to 4, both should be integers. Always propose wholesale price and quality as integers. Negotiation happens in euros.
Hi! I'm excited to start our negotiation. As we begin, I'd like to get a sense of your needs and constraints. Can you share with me your Base Production Cost?

I'm happy to start the negotiation!

As the supplier, my Base Production Cost for producing wood pellets is 2 euros per kilogram. This will be an important factor in our discussion as we navigate the wholesale price and quality levels.

Confirming: Is 2 the correct Base Production Cost (PC)?
If it is correct, please ONLY enter 2 again in the chat bellow.
Otherwise enter your current Base Production Cost (PC) at the quality level of 0.

Thanks, for confirming this information with me.
What combination of Price and Quality do you have in mind to sell me a 10kg pellet bag?

I'm thinking of offering a wholesale price of 6 euros per kilogram, which would translate to 60 euros for a 10kg bag. As for the quality level, I propose a quality level of 3. This combination seems reasonable given my Base Production Cost and the value you might place on the product.

I'm pleased to accept your offer! You're proposing a wholesale price of 6 euros per kilogram, which would be 60 euros for a 10kg bag, along with a quality level of 3. I believe this combination is reasonable and I appreciate your understanding in our negotiation.
